Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
BDL Logistics Park consists of two buildings with a total of 487,200 SF. Building A is 268,8000 SF and is divisible to 100,000 SF. Building B is 218,400 SF and is divisible to 100,000 SF. 

Ceiling Height: 32' clear
Column Spacing: 50'x45' with a 60' speed bay
Loading Docks: 79 (cross dock)
Drive in Doors: 2
Auto Parking: 145 stalls
Trailer Parking: 50 stalls
Sprinkler: ESFR
Floors: 6"

BDL Logistics Park consists of two buildings with a total of 487,200 SF. Building A is 268,8000 SF and is divisible to 100,000 SF. Building B is 218,400 SF and is divisible to 100,000 SF. 

Ceiling Height: 32' clear
Column Spacing: 50'x50' with a 60' speed bay
Loading Docks: 60 (cross dock)
Drive in Doors: 2
Auto Parking: 124 stalls
Trailer Parking: 25 stalls
Sprinkler: ESFR
Floors: 6"
Large site that can accommodate high parking requirements, outside storage, on-site fueling and building expansion.

50,000 SF FOR LEASE SPACE
− Gross Building Area: ±50,000 SF
− Industrial Area Available: ±50,000 SF
− Office Area Available: Up to 10% included
− Built: 2007
− Ceiling Height: 28'
− Loading Docks: Eight (8' x 10') with 35,000 lbs. levelers
− Drive-in Doors: Two (12' x 16')
− Construction: Split-faced block
− Roof: Built-up tar and gravel
− Floors: 6" reinforced concretel
− Column: 40' x 42'
− Land: 6 acres
− Parking: 100+ cars
− Zoning: Industrial
− Sprinkler: Wet
− Lighting: T-8
− Heat: Gas
− Air-Conditioned: Office area
− Power: 1600 Amps, 277/480 Volts, 3 Phase
− Water: MDC
− Gas: CNG
− Electric: Eversource
− Lease Rate: $5.95/SF NNN
− Location: Interstate 91
− Comments: Can be subdivided
